info.name: ðŸ“Œ Mistral AI API
info.description:
### Prerequisites

- Postman
- Mistral AI Account: [https://console.mistral.ai/](https://console.mistral.ai/)
    

### Usage

1. Create a fork
2. Update collection variables
3. Send requests
    

### Documentation

- API: [https://docs.mistral.ai/api](https://docs.mistral.ai/api)
- Models: [https://docs.mistral.ai/models](https://docs.mistral.ai/models)
    

### About Mistral AI

Open and portable generative AI for developers and businesses.
